item.title: Hegseth orders pause in US cyber-offensive against Russia
item.description: The reported directive from the defence secretary comes during an American push to end the war in Ukraine.

item.title: Mother on trial over abduction of six-year-old daughter in South Africa
item.description: Joshlin Smith has been missing for over a year after she disappeared outside her home in Saldanha Bay

item.title: Bubble tea chain bigger than Starbucks sees shares jump on debut
item.description: Mixue's shares rose by more than 40% in their Hong Kong Stock Exchange debut.

item.description: The deal is worth up to Â£1.6bn and will involve recruiting 200 additional staff.

item.title: Watch: Standout moments from the Oscars 2025
item.description: Anora sweeps the Oscars with five awards including best picture and best actress for star Mikey Madison.
